Package bitutils

Interface Summary
BitArray BitArray is an interface to work with bits arrays instead of byte arrays
 

Class Summary
BitArrayBooleanArray  
BitArrayBooleanList  
BitArrayByteArray  
BitInputStream A BitInputStream allows to work with any InputStream on a bit based basis.
BitOutputStream  
 

Enum Summary
BitArray.Endianness  
BitArrayBooleanArray.Endianness  
BitArrayBooleanList.Endianness  
BitArrayByteArray.Endianness  
 

Exception Summary
ArrayTooShortException An ArrayTooShortException is thrown when a byte array does not contains enough bits to fill a BitArray.
